description:
Do you wonder why governments levy tax?

Do you want to know what is Income Tax?

Do you want to know how income and income tax is calculated?

Do you want to know the legal sections and provisions governing income tax in India?

Then this course is for you.

Welcome to Basics of Indian Income Tax.

In India, Income Tax legislation is considered as one of the most complex legislation involving year after year changes, amendments, circulars, cases, etc.

Income Tax affects literally every Indian citizen who is supposed to pay tax. Hence, it is essential for every Indian citizen to have knowledge on the Indian Tax provisions. This course will take you through the basics of Indian Income Tax provisions.

Indian Income Tax provisions are governed by Indian Income Tax Act, 1961. Knowledge of the tax provisions will help in tax planning as well as avoid tax litigations.

Every year tax returns have to be filed by every person who is covered by the provisions and rules of Income Tax Act.

Income tax return is the declaration filed by the persons about their income earned to the Income Tax Department.

Not filing the returns will attract complications.

Similarly not filing the correct returns will also attract complications.

So, by taking up this course, you will understand

a) Meaning of Tax

b) Different types of Tax

c) Why tax is levied

d) Components of Income Tax Law

e) Income as per Income Tax Act

f) Procedure in computing the total income for calculating Income Tax

g) Requirement of Advance Tax

h) Requirement of Tax Deduction at Source

i) Return of Income

j) Rates of Tax

k) Concept of Assessment Year and Previous Year

l) Undisclosed sources of Income

m) Residential Status

n) Income deemed to be received in India

o) Income accruing or arising in India

p) Income deemed to accrue or arise in India

q) Many critical points in Income Tax

This course is structured in self paced learning style.

The course content is provided in the form of Video Lectures.

Simple terminologies were used and the audience from any back ground can take up this course.

Take this course to understand the basics of Indian Income Tax.
title: Basics of Income Tax (College Level)
instructors: CA Raja Natarajan, B.Com., PGDBA, FCA
